Text: Stardust Memorial Park (Irish: An Pháirc Cuimhneacháin Stardust ), also known as the Stardust Memorial Garden, is a protected memorial park located in Coolock, Dublin built to commemorate the lives of those who died in the Stardust nightclub 1981 fire in Artane, Dublin.
Triplets:<Stardust Memorial Park
1:
Text: Stardust Memorial Park:  The park was officially completed and opened on 18 September 1993, by the then Lord Mayor of Dublin, Tomás MacGiolla.
